title: 626 - Your Mom's House with Christina P and Tom Segura
description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://Squarespace.com/MOM for a free trial and when you’re ready to launch, and use the offer code MOM to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain - Head to https://policygenius.com to get started right now. When it comes to insurance, it's nice to get it right - Go to https://HelloTushy.com/YOURMOM to get 10% off plus free shipping! - Check out https://FIVERR.com and receive 10% off your first order by using our code MOM. - Go to https://WHOOP.com and use code “MOM” at checkout to save yourself 15% off today. - Go to https://Talkspace.com and get $100 off your first month with the promo code YMH.

Pull your jeans up over your head for this week's YMH with Tom Segura and Christina P! We get an update on #GloveLife, Daddy Lalagon, and the new Brittany Murphy documentary. Chrisjeansa reveals some real neat Pazsitzky Effects just like when she realized boneless chicken wings aren't just deboned wings! We watch an eye exorcism, a mom who wants NWA songs out of the curriculum, and a lathe video that Nadav enjoys. We got weather updates, dental updates, and we check in with our dear friend Dr. Joe Kort for an interview!
